ValidationRule.description: When closing Case , supported product is mandatory for Technical Issue cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser', $Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD', $Profile.Name != 'GTO FSE/PSE/CSPM (Non US)', (ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Tech Issue-SR Assigned') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Propose to Close')), (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Quick Case'))), Supported_Products__c ='', OR($RecordType.Name == 'Technical Issue',$RecordType.DeveloperName =$Label.AeroCustomerSupportRecTypeName) )
